title: Instant Win
subtitle: Motivate your current and future brand evangelists by activating a fun and rewarding Instant Win promotional experience on your page.
intro_title: Your Fans Live In An Instant Gratification World...
intro_description: So have your brand promotions satisfy their desire for speedy returns. Our Instant Win apps let your fans know immediately when they've won a prize, discount, or special offer.

features.title: Wheel of Deal
features.description: People like discounts, but they love a chance at scoring even deeper ones. Keep your fans coming back (and engagement high) by giving them a shot at spinning their way to an amazing deal.

features.title: Fortune Teller
features.description: Launch a fortune-telling-like experience on your Facebook page with this instant predictor app (no stale cookie eating required).

features.title: Scratch And Win
features.description: Let our team activate an addictive scratch-off experience for your brand just like the one in your local convenience store. Except this version doesn't leave a mess when played.

features.title: Under The Cap
features.description: Satisfy your fans' thirst for instant results by having our team craft an entertaining under the cap promotion for your brand. Rewards could include discounts, product, or exclusive content.
